base: Multiple desert landing grounds: LG.154 (2-23 Oct), LG.172 (23 Oct-11 Nov), LG.101 (11-18 Nov), El Adem (18-28 Nov), Benina (28 Nov-11 Feb 1943)

operations_history.operation: Advance to Tunisia - Coastal Shipping Protection

sources: historyofwar.org - No. 33 Squadron RAF WWII history (Tier 2)
key.aero - RAF Hurricanes at El Alamein (Tier 2)
Wikipedia - Desert Air Force organization (overview only)
metadata.notes: Tier 2 extraction. Commander name not found in Tier 1/2 sources for Q4 1942. Base locations documented from historyofwar.org (5 different LGs during quarter). Personnel based on standard RAF fighter squadron establishment (~200-220 total). Aircraft strength (16x Hurricane IIC) confirmed from multiple sources as Desert Air Force standard. Lance Wade served as deputy commander/notable pilot during 1942. Operational sorties/claims data not available for this quarter. Hurricane IIC variant confirmed from June 1942-Dec 1943 period.
metadata.witw_validation: Not yet cross-referenced with WITW air database
